import React, {useState} from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function CreateRecipe(){ const[input,setInput] = useState({ name:"", tipodeplato: "", healthscore: "", imagen:"", summary: "", pasoapaso: "", diets:[] }) const submitHandler=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() } const handleChange=(e)=>{ setInput({ ...input, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) } const handleChangeB=(e)=>{ setInput({ ...input, [e.target.name]:e.target.value.push() }) } return(

Create new recipe

Diets:
If you don´t know which diet your recipe corresponds to, please check here
) }
